featured.text: The soybean is free of cholesterol, and more importantly, the soy oil contains some special substances, called Omega 3 fatty acids, which reduce cholesterol and prevent blood from clotting in human body.

definition.zh_def: 希臘字母表的最後一個字母，通常用來表示結束或極限。
definition.en_def: The last letter of the Greek alphabet, often used to signify the end or limit.
definition.example: The project was considered the omega of our efforts, marking the conclusion of years of hard work.
